title: Ona Cafe and Terrassa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Indian, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Tapas, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A lounge restaurant offers vegetarian and vegan menu items like Indian curries, pakora, nachos with guacamole, salads, fresh juices, drinks with almond and soy milk. Chef is knowledgeable about veganism. Wi-fi. Live music concerts and DJs.
